ffmpegPrefsIni:
[Version]
Version=4

[Medium 768 kbit - with Subtitle]
Cmd=-threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -f flv -c:v libx264 -crf 21 -maxrate 768k -bufsize 1300k {framerate} -deinterlace -filter_complex "[0:v][0:s]overlay,scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -preset {vpreset} -tune film -vprofile main -level 3.1 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 64k -ar 22050 -ac 2 -af volume=1.500000 -y "{outfile}"
maxWidth=640
maxHeight=480
MimeType=video/x-flv
Ext=.flv
Bitrate=768
Selected=1

[Lowest 24 kbit - with Subtitle]
Cmd=-threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -f flv -c:v libx264 -crf 21 -maxrate 24k -bufsize 512k {framerate} -deinterlace -filter_complex "[0:v][0:s]overlay,scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -preset {vpreset} -tune film -vprofile main -level 3.1 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 16k -ar 11025 -ac 1 -af volume=1.500000 -y "{outfile}"
maxWidth=160
maxHeight=120
MimeType=video/x-flv
Ext=.flv
Bitrate=24
Selected=1

[WebM HD 3600 kbit]
Cmd=-analyzeduration 1500k -threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -threads {threads} -f webm -vcodec libvpx -quality {quality} -bufsize 6400k -b:v 3200k -crf  10 -cpu-used {cpu-used} {framerate} -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -vf "yadif=0:-1:1, scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -acodec libvorbis -ab 128k -ar 44100 -ac 2 -async 1 -y "{outfile}"
maxWidth=1280
maxHeight=720
MimeType=video/webm
Ext=.webm
Delay=2000

Cmd=-analyzeduration 1500k -threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -threads {threads} -f webm -vcodec libvpx -quality {quality} -bufsize 3200k -b:v 1600k -crf  15 -cpu-used {cpu-used} {framerate} -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -vf "yadif=0:-1:1, scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -acodec libvorbis -ab 96k -ar 44100 -ac 2 -async 1 -y "{outfile}"
